name: Jimbo & Dimbo Space Adventure
description:
Welcome to Jimbo and Dimbo Space Adventure! 

Jimbo and Dimbo find themselves in a life and death situation! They are forced to emergency land with their ship on an unfamiliar planet after they lose one of the engines and the left wing of the ship. In this unfamiliar world, they needed to explore this mysterious world and find and collect the missing part of their ship. 

Jimbo and Dimbo must be careful with the unknown spider robot that will attack you on sight. But be warned. Do not leave the ship defenseless when night falls. The spider robot that lurks around the world will come out from the darkness and look for ships that have crashed in their world and they are hungry for machine parts! Jimbo and Dimbo must defend themselves and the Mothership. 

With their weapons they can create elemental combinations to aid them in combat by covering the enemies in oil before shooting them with fire to cause a burning explosion. Or they can soak them in water and later shoot them with electricity to electrocute them and stun them for a while.

Enjoy this action packed coop FPS that encourages teamwork to make combat more efficient and rewarding.
